allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS petunia_play CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE petunia_play; SELECT COUNT(*) as total_users FROM users;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE petunia_play; SELECT COUNT(*) as usuarios_actualizados FROM users;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE petunia_play; SELECT email, name, role FROM users ORDER BY role, email LIMIT 15;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE petunia_play; SELECT email, name, role FROM users WHERE role IN (''admin'', ''manager'') ORDER BY role;")
